remarks: Induction theorem for closure: any other set ` Q ` closed under the axioms and the hypotheses contains all the elements of the closure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mclsval.d $e |- D = ( mDV ` T ) $.
mclsval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mclsval.c $e |- C = ( mCls ` T ) $.
mclsval.1 $e |- ( ph -> T e. mFS ) $.
mclsval.2 $e |- ( ph -> K C_ D ) $.
mclsval.3 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ E ) $.
mclsax.a $e |- A = ( mAx ` T ) $.
mclsax.l $e |- L = ( mSubst ` T ) $.
mclsax.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mclsax.h $e |- H = ( mVH ` T ) $.
mclsax.w $e |- W = ( mVars ` T ) $.
mclsind.4 $e |- ( ph -> B C_ Q ) $.
mclsind.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ v e. V ) -> ( H ` v ) e. Q ) $.
mclsind.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( <. m , o , p >. e. A /\ s e. ran L /\ ( s " ( o u. ran H ) ) C_ Q ) /\ A. x A. y ( x m y -> ( ( W ` ( s ` ( H ` x ) ) ) X. ( W ` ( s ` ( H ` y ) ) ) ) C_ K ) ) -> ( s ` p ) e. Q ) $.
mclsind $p |- ( ph -> ( K C B ) C_ Q ) $.
